arts.ttl: Newcastle United vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Newcastle United will be looking to carry their midweek European form into the Premier League on Sunday when they host a struggling Nottingham Forest side at St. James’ Park. Eddie Howe’s team have endured their worst start to a season under his management.
